sk.tomsik68.mclauncher.api.login

Interface ILoginService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IOnlineService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LegacyLoginService, YDLoginService

    public interface ILoginService
extends IOnlineService
    Login Service is responsible for converting IProfile to ISession. It's up to developer to choose login service.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISession login(IProfile profile)
      Logs in using specified profile
      void logout(ISession session)
      If it's possible, invalidates the specified session

      • Methods inherited from interface sk.tomsik68.mclauncher.api.services.IOnlineService

        isAvailable

    • Method Detail

      • login

        ISession login(IProfile profile)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Logs in using specified profile
        Parameters:
        profile - - Profile to log in
        Returns:
        ISession object if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - Connection failed, or LoginException if login failed

      • logout

        void logout(ISession session)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        If it's possible, invalidates the specified session
        Parameters:
        session - Session to invalidate
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - Connection failed
